text: Although the metro station is still there and called Merlion, the actual Sentosa Merlion is closed as an attraction. There are in fact several Merlions dotted around Singapore - although this one is one of the best known.

It is a good place for photography. From here you can go for beach station or santosa station by train . You can go with bus also. Here train , tram , buses all are free and going for inter station traveling.
It is a good place for photography. From here you can go for beach station or sentosa station by train
came here before the pandemic, super hot on sunny day. but it has lots of boof and drinks stalls. so many things to do here from climbing up to the mouth of merlion and many more.

Literally the most disorganised team running this place. We've watched almost 50% of cable cars go up empty as they don't have enough staff checking tickets and ushering. 30 mins wait when it could have been 10 mins if they were able to get onto the cable cars
